attributes.action: Require the BBC to stick to its planned schedule of BBC News 24 and its broadcasting of the program Click
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Except when duties as a Public Service Broadcaster require them to do such actions we the undersigned enjoy the programme and due to its untimely slots we petition the PM to keep it stuck to a schedule

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
